text: Félix Auger-Aliassime was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Kimmer Coppejans won the title after defeating Alex Molčan 7–6(7–2), 6–1 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Copa Sevilla - Singles 2018 Singles
